reviewText:
This a phenomenal film!!! A perrenial classic...

For every fan of John Woo's The Killer... this is the original...

much the same way De Palma's Scarface was a remake... this is the same type... all the elements of Chow Yun Fat's Jeffery Chow originate here..

A can't miss for fans of the hitman genre... this one started it all
